## Goal

* Tool to visualize patient time profile metrics for experiment of interest

## Technology

* Application to visualize patient profile
* Open-source [R](https://www.r-project.org/) software and add-on R packages
  packages: 
     + data import: `haven`, visualization: `ggplot2`
     + interface creation: `shiny`
* Tools:
    + for R expert: `patientProfilesVis` R package
    + for Medics: application in the `patientProfilesVisShiny` R deployed in a
      _Galapagos_ Development server
      
## General

* Framework:
    + Create time profile for each set of metrics of interest, e.g. main
        endpoint, laboratory parameters, adverse event, subject-specific
        metadata information
    + Combine the different modules across time frame
    + Create patient profile report
* Modular approach: 4 types of modules: text, event, interval and line profile
* Input: `SDTM` or `ADaM` files of study of interest in standardized format

## Application

* Creation of the time profile visualization directly from a web browser
* Default module settings available for `SDTM` format
* Creation of user-custom visualization:
    + preview panel
    + Share settings with collaborators
        + easier graphics creation for new version of the datasets

## Application: 

* Technical details:
    + `Shiny` application embedded in the R package
    + Local of server deployment
    + Deployment with the [`ShinyProxy`](https://www.shinyproxy.io/) technology
         + `Docker` container encapsule all tools -> fixed version of `R` base
           and packages 
         + Scale up to large number of users
